page.title: 04A child's life in Fauldhouse
page.content: I usually get up at about 8.15 and get dressed, get my breakfast of cereal and milk straight after, but if there is no milk ,I go to the shop on my {BMX }bike which is a specially built bicycle to withstand great impact. Then I come back and watch television until 9.00 then I go to school,which opens at 9.10.We start work after prayers with spelling , S.R.A., maths and sometimes Junior History. Interval is 10.45 until 11.00 and we usually play{Red Rover}which is where there are two lines of people facing each other and one side calls for someone{e.g.:" Red Rover,Red Rover {send Paul Lee right over !"} Then Paul Lee has to try to break through a line of people holding hands,if he succeeds he then goes back to his own team and they choose who has to come over.
